multiChoice.question: Which of the following activites do you like to do most?
multiChoice.ID: Develop print documents for training purposes.
multiChoice.gd: Create / manipulate images in computer editing programs.

multiChoice.question: Which of the following qualities best describes you?
multiChoice.lms: Organized, able to multi-task and problem solve.

multiChoice.question: Do you learn best by...
multiChoice.ID: Having details written down, A-Z, how to accomplish your goal?
multiChoice.lms: Hearing how it is done to formultate how you want to proceed after analyzing all of the parts?
multiChoice.gd: Visually seeing how something is done, with pictures or a map?
